content: the round or from bottom to top row by row yarn scheepjes stone washed yarn weight sport ball weight 50 g yarn length 130 m 142 17 yds gauge 10 stitches in 5cm 2 by 10 row in 5cm 2 in mosaic stitch pattern using a different gauge won t affect the design but it will change the finish size and the amount of yarn needed hook 3 25 mm hook size needed to match the gauge yardage approx 4000 meters of sport weight yarn for each of your two colors which is a total approx of 8000 meters of yarn 4300 yards per colors a total of 8600 yards of yarn 1500-1600 g for each colors size 150 cm wide and 210 cm long 59 inches wide and 82 1/2 inches long
